problem_names:
lemma measure_parity:
  "(strict{(x::parity,y). x \<sqsubseteq> y})^-1 \<subseteq> measure m_parity"

lemma measure_parity_eq:
  "\<forall>x y::parity. x \<sqsubseteq> y \<and> y \<sqsubseteq> x \<longrightarrow> m_parity x = m_parity y"
lemma AI_parity_Some: "\<exists>c'. AI_parity c = Some c'"
translations:
lemma measure_parity:
  "(strict{(x::parity,y). x \<sqsubseteq> y})^-1 \<subseteq> measure m_parity"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (strict {(x, y). x \<sqsubseteq> y})\<inverse>
    \<subseteq> measure m_parity

lemma measure_parity_eq:
  "\<forall>x y::parity. x \<sqsubseteq> y \<and> y \<sqsubseteq> x \<longrightarrow> m_parity x = m_parity y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x y.
       x \<sqsubseteq> y \<and> y \<sqsubseteq> x \<longrightarrow>
       m_parity x = m_parity y
lemma AI_parity_Some: "\<exists>c'. AI_parity c = Some c'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>c'. AI_parity c = Some c'
